Traits.Name: Eerie Presence
Traits.Content: Hollows emanate a sense of unease. Creatures within 10 feet of a Hollow have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against being frightened.

Traits.Name: Unyielding Form
Traits.Content: As an undead, Hollows cannot die in the traditional sense. When reduced to 0 hit points, they automatically stabilize and remain unconscious, unable to be revived until they are healed.

Actions.Name: Soul Siphon
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 8 (1d10 + 3) necrotic damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

Actions.Name: Deathly Whispers (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Hollow emits a haunting whisper that chills the soul. Each creature in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, creatures are also frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Grasp of the Past
Actions.Content: Hollows extend their bony hands to grasp at the memories of their victim. Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 15 (2d12 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, they cannot take reactions until the end of their next turn, as they are momentarily paralyzed by memories of their past.

Actions.Name: Dreamless Slumber
Actions.Content: The Hollow taps into the sleep of a creature nearby, attempting to pull them into a dreamless state. The target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be put into a magical slumber for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, waking on a success. While asleep, the creature is unconscious.
